scone.ui.selectable_class



abstract class UISelectable: scone.ui.element.UIElement;
Parent of all selectable elements

@property auto active();
Returns:
bool, true if option is active (enabled)

@property auto active(bool active);
Set if option is active.

@property auto execute();
Returns:
void delegate()

@property auto onExecute(void delegate() action);
Set action upon executing element.
